name: peerage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C usually singular ] the position of being a peer: She was given a peerage. He was elevated to the peerage after distinguished service in industry. the peerage [ S, + sing/pl verb ]
the group of people who are peers, either because of their families or because they are life peers
[ C ] a book containing information about peers who are not life peers and their family history
